description: 3-year period during which data were collected
General demographic category under which responses have been stratified
Number of deaths due to asthma (source: Vital Statistics)
Calculated by dividing the number of asthma deaths by the estimated population in that county and age group, age-adjusting to the 2000 U.S. Census, and multiplying by 1,000,000

Information on data suppression. Counts less than or equal to 5 and their rates are suppressed in accordance with CHHS Data De-identification Guidelines. Rates based on counts less than 12 are suppressed due to statistical instability.
